entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:25 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 07:00 AM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -27.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -32.7°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 18.
